wikipedia_page.main: Henry Pelham "Hal" Cazalet (born 16 September 1969) is a British tenor opera singer.

response: In 2018, along with his international masterclass and teaching commitments, Hugh Wooldridge directed Play on Words – a celebration of PG Wodehouse and his fellow Wordsmiths on Broadway – with Hal Cazalet at Live at Zedel/Crazy Coqs and in New York; and another production of Jesus Christ Superstar at Teatru Astra, Gozo/Malta.
